topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ebe59e6368722159921500#post_54ebe59e6368722159921500
Not to mention the series ALREADY had a lesbian couple in it from what I've been told. So two girls kiss and it's all hunky-dory, but two guys kiss and it's the end of the fucking world. Although to be fair, I'm pretty sure these douchebags are less than one percent of The Walking Dead's viewership.
